page.title: 13LAW AND ORDER
page.content: {The Police Station}and{Court House} were built in 1901 because it was thought that Southminster would grow into a large town because of the {market}held there and therefore require these facilities.This has not happened and the market closed in 1969.It is a{magistrates'}court and is attached to the police station which has cells but they are not heated so prisoners who have to be kept overnight have to be transferred to Chelmsford.Southminster is the{main {police station}for the{Dengie {Hundred.}There are four policemen who work shifts.There is a{Marine Section which patrols the{Rivers Crouch and {Blackwater}and all rivers as far north as {Harwich}.The section has two launches,one Fast Dory and employs one sergeant and eight constables.
